bot: The document is an application for an internship at NITI Aayog. The applicant is Mr. Shlok Pankaj Salunke, born on June 5, 2005. He is currently pursuing a B.Tech/BE degree, having started in July 2023 and expected to complete in May 2027. He completed his HSC Senior Secondary in March 2023 with 66%. His area of interest is Data Management and Analysis, and he is applying for an internship starting in April 2025. The application includes his contact details, educational qualifications, and a declaration of the accuracy of the information provided. The application was submitted on February 7, 2025, from Shirpur.
